content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252832,"originalJapaneseLine":"当初はキナニ砂漠方面からの進軍だけだったが、そちらに気を取られている隙に","translatedEnglishLine":"At first, the advance was only from the Kinani Desert area, but while they were distracted there,"},{"lineNumber":252833,"originalJapaneseLine":"番裏の長城も半分は突破されている。\t\t","translatedEnglishLine":"the Great Wall at the rear has also been breached halfway."},{"lineNumber":252834,"originalJapaneseLine":"総指揮はヒューバート、今も最前線に出ている","translatedEnglishLine":"The overall commander is Hubert, who is still at the frontline."},{"lineNumber":252835,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮから上杉家を中心とした５万の部隊が送られてきている。","translatedEnglishLine":"A force of 50,000 troops centered around the Uesugi clan has been sent from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":252836,"originalJapaneseLine":"非常に助かっている。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are a great help."},{"lineNumber":252837,"originalJapaneseLine":"味方側の総兵力は３０万ほど（正確な数はもう把握出来ない）","translatedEnglishLine":"Our total allied forces number about 300,000 (the exact count is no longer known)."},{"lineNumber":252838,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍は魔物大将軍ルメイが率いる１００万からの軍勢","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army, led by Great Demon General Lumei, numbers over one million."},{"lineNumber":252839,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに魔人バボラ、魔人ケイブリスがいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, there are the demon lords Babora and Kebris."},{"lineNumber":252840,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは会話というより、ナレーション的に説明","translatedEnglishLine":"This is more of a narration-style explanation rather than a conversation."},{"lineNumber":252841,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ラングバウについからも説明の機会があります、うまく別けて下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":"(There will also be an opportunity to explain about Langbau later; please separate them appropriately.)"},{"lineNumber":252842,"originalJapaneseLine":"行軍中のランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others on the march."},{"lineNumber":252843,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルとヘルマンの話","translatedEnglishLine":"A conversation between Siehl and Herman."},{"lineNumber":252844,"originalJapaneseLine":"パットンの奴に泣いて懇願されてヘルマン革命を手伝ってやったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"That Patton guy begged me tearfully, so I helped with the Herman revolution."},{"lineNumber":252845,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラ姫は当然ゲットした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, I got Princess Sheela."},{"lineNumber":252846,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、せっかく俺様が革命を成功させてやったのに、魔軍に攻められて","translatedEnglishLine":"But even though I made the revolution succeed, they’re getting attacked by the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":252847,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼろぼろだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"and things are falling apart."},{"lineNumber":252848,"originalJapaneseLine":"行軍中のランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others on the march."},{"lineNumber":252849,"originalJapaneseLine":"早くラングバウに行って魔人を退治してやらんとな。","translatedEnglishLine":"We need to hurry to Langbau and deal with the demon lords."},{"lineNumber":252850,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういや、この編にマルグリッド遺跡が確かあったよな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, there was the Marugrid Ruins in this area, wasn’t there?"},{"lineNumber":252851,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは知らないだろうが、俺様はそこでも大冒険をしたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Siehl probably doesn’t know, but I had a great adventure there too."},{"lineNumber":252852,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界最大の迷宮で地下何階あるか分からないのだ、すごいだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s the world’s largest labyrinth; no one knows how many underground floors it has—pretty amazing, right?"},{"lineNumber":252853,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は確か４２５階まで踏破したかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I think I managed to explore all the way down to the 425th floor."},{"lineNumber":252854,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、記録更新したくなったぞ。少し寄っていこうか","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I feel like breaking my record. Let’s drop by for a bit."},{"lineNumber":252855,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":252856,"originalJapaneseLine":"マルグリッド迷宮についた。ランス８と同じノリ","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ve arrived at the Marugrid Labyrinth. Same vibe as Rance 8."},{"lineNumber":252857,"originalJapaneseLine":"４２６階に行きますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we go to the 426th floor?"},{"lineNumber":252858,"originalJapaneseLine":"行くぞ・・とー　エレベーターで下へ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s go... down by elevator."},{"lineNumber":252859,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":252860,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、４２７階の入り口を発見だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we’ve found the entrance to the 427th floor."},{"lineNumber":252861,"originalJapaneseLine":"影に隠れていた女の子が現れる、メリムだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A girl who was hiding in the shadows appears—Merim."},{"lineNumber":252862,"originalJapaneseLine":"メリムの強さではこんな所にはこれないはずだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"With Merim’s strength, she shouldn’t be able to come to a place like this, but..."},{"lineNumber":252863,"originalJapaneseLine":"１階をうろうろしていたら落とし穴（シューター）、またはトラップでここに落ちてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"She was wandering the first floor and fell here through a pitfall (shooter) or a trap."},{"lineNumber":252864,"originalJapaneseLine":"困っていた所ですが、ランスさんが来てくれてよかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"She was in trouble, but it’s good that Rance came along."},{"lineNumber":252865,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、メリムを連れて地上に戻ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we’ll take Merim and return to the surface."},{"lineNumber":252866,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、４２７階の入り口だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, here’s the entrance to the 427th floor."},{"lineNumber":252867,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じだ。こうしてどんどん下まで進むのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that. This is how we keep pushing downwards."},{"lineNumber":252868,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう１階いってみようか。俺様の征服欲が先へ先へいざなうのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we go down one more floor? My desire for conquest leads me further and further."},{"lineNumber":252869,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルが今はそんな事をしている場合で無いとうまくたしなめる","translatedEnglishLine":"Siehl skillfully admonishes that now is no time for that."},{"lineNumber":252870,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないな、戻るかと地上に戻ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Can’t be helped, let’s return — we head back to the surface."},{"lineNumber":252871,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrive at a typical village in Herman."},{"lineNumber":252872,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ魔軍が攻めてきてない所のようだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems the demon army hasn’t attacked here yet."},{"lineNumber":252873,"originalJapaneseLine":"警備隊が現れる、ルーベランだ。ランス９以来です。","translatedEnglishLine":"The guard appears—Rubelan. It’s been since Rance 9."},{"lineNumber":252874,"originalJapaneseLine":"革命の事は感謝しているが、法は法だ。手続きだ大事だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We appreciate the revolution, but the law is the law. Procedures matter."},{"lineNumber":252875,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは急ぐと言うのに、まて司令部に連絡して通行許可の確認を取るとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though Rance says we’re in a hurry, he insists on waiting to contact headquarters to get passage permission."},{"lineNumber":252876,"originalJapaneseLine":"手間取る事を言うので、どこかに連れ込んで抱く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Since they say such troublesome things, I take them somewhere and embrace them."},{"lineNumber":252877,"originalJapaneseLine":"（エロシーンはテキストだけで、それっぽく）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The erotic scene is just text, but implied.)"},{"lineNumber":252878,"originalJapaneseLine":"という事だ、わかったな","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s how it is, understood?"},{"lineNumber":252879,"originalJapaneseLine":"分かるかー","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you understand?"},{"lineNumber":252880,"originalJapaneseLine":"うざうざ言うなら、お前が同行して監視しておればよいだろうが","translatedEnglishLine":"If you’re so annoying, you should accompany us and watch over things yourself."},{"lineNumber":252881,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうさせてもらう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll do that."},{"lineNumber":252882,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrived at a typical village in Herman."},{"lineNumber":252883,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍が攻めてきた後のようだ、廃墟になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like the demon army attacked here; it’s now ruins."},{"lineNumber":252884,"originalJapaneseLine":"生き残った村人が数名います","translatedEnglishLine":"There are a few surviving villagers."},{"lineNumber":252885,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な魔人が攻めてきたので、この村を踏み荒らしていった","translatedEnglishLine":"A gigantic demon lord attacked and trampled through this village."},{"lineNumber":252886,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後まで勇敢に我々を守ってくれた警備隊の隊長さんも踏まれてぺしゃんこ","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the brave captain of the guards who protected us until the end was crushed beneath."},{"lineNumber":252887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※[５２１／ヘルマン被害１]が実行された後のシーンです","translatedEnglishLine":"※This scene occurs after [521/Herman Damage 1] has been executed."},{"lineNumber":252888,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン軍の陣地に着く、ラングバウへ向かう途中","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrive at the Herman army camp, on the way to Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252889,"originalJapaneseLine":"アミトスが現れる、第１軍の将軍になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Amitos appears, now a general of the 1st Army."},{"lineNumber":252890,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに軽く挨拶をするが、話込んでいる暇は無く、次々と部下から入る","translatedEnglishLine":"He greets Rance briefly, but there’s no time for chatting as reports keep coming in from his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252891,"originalJapaneseLine":"情報を聞き指示を出している。","translatedEnglishLine":"He listens to the information and issues orders."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当初はキナニ砂漠方面からの進軍だけだったが、そちらに気を取られている隙に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first, the advance was only from the Kinani Desert area, but while they were distracted there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の長城も半分は突破されている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Great Wall at the rear has also been breached halfway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総指揮はヒューバート、今も最前線に出ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The overall commander is Hubert, who is still at the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから上杉家を中心とした５万の部隊が送られてきている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A force of 50,000 troops centered around the Uesugi clan has been sent from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 非常に助かっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are a great help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方側の総兵力は３０万ほど（正確な数はもう把握出来ない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our total allied forces number about 300,000 (the exact count is no longer known).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍は魔物大将軍ルメイが率いる１００万からの軍勢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army, led by Great Demon General Lumei, numbers over one million.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに魔人バボラ、魔人ケイブリスがいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, there are the demon lords Babora and Kebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは会話というより、ナレーション的に説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is more of a narration-style explanation rather than a conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ラングバウについからも説明の機会があります、うまく別けて下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (There will also be an opportunity to explain about Langbau later; please separate them appropriately.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中のランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others on the march.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとヘルマンの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation between Siehl and Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンの奴に泣いて懇願されてヘルマン革命を手伝ってやったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Patton guy begged me tearfully, so I helped with the Herman revolution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ姫は当然ゲットした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, I got Princess Sheela.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、せっかく俺様が革命を成功させてやったのに、魔軍に攻められて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even though I made the revolution succeed, they’re getting attacked by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and things are falling apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中のランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others on the march.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早くラングバウに行って魔人を退治してやらんとな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to hurry to Langbau and deal with the demon lords.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、この編にマルグリッド遺跡が確かあったよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, there was the Marugrid Ruins in this area, wasn’t there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは知らないだろうが、俺様はそこでも大冒険をしたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siehl probably doesn’t know, but I had a great adventure there too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最大の迷宮で地下何階あるか分からないのだ、すごいだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the world’s largest labyrinth; no one knows how many underground floors it has—pretty amazing, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は確か４２５階まで踏破したかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think I managed to explore all the way down to the 425th floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、記録更新したくなったぞ。少し寄っていこうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I feel like breaking my record. Let’s drop by for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルグリッド迷宮についた。ランス８と同じノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve arrived at the Marugrid Labyrinth. Same vibe as Rance 8.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４２６階に行きますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we go to the 426th floor?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行くぞ・・とー　エレベーターで下へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s go... down by elevator.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、４２７階の入り口を発見だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we’ve found the entrance to the 427th floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影に隠れていた女の子が現れる、メリムだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl who was hiding in the shadows appears—Merim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メリムの強さではこんな所にはこれないはずだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With Merim’s strength, she shouldn’t be able to come to a place like this, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １階をうろうろしていたら落とし穴（シューター）、またはトラップでここに落ちてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was wandering the first floor and fell here through a pitfall (shooter) or a trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困っていた所ですが、ランスさんが来てくれてよかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was in trouble, but it’s good that Rance came along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、メリムを連れて地上に戻ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we’ll take Merim and return to the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、４２７階の入り口だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, here’s the entrance to the 427th floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じだ。こうしてどんどん下まで進むのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that. This is how we keep pushing downwards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう１階いってみようか。俺様の征服欲が先へ先へいざなうのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we go down one more floor? My desire for conquest leads me further and further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが今はそんな事をしている場合で無いとうまくたしなめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siehl skillfully admonishes that now is no time for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないな、戻るかと地上に戻ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can’t be helped, let’s return — we head back to the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive at a typical village in Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ魔軍が攻めてきてない所のようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the demon army hasn’t attacked here yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警備隊が現れる、ルーベランだ。ランス９以来です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The guard appears—Rubelan. It’s been since Rance 9.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 革命の事は感謝しているが、法は法だ。手続きだ大事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We appreciate the revolution, but the law is the law. Procedures matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは急ぐと言うのに、まて司令部に連絡して通行許可の確認を取るとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though Rance says we’re in a hurry, he insists on waiting to contact headquarters to get passage permission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手間取る事を言うので、どこかに連れ込んで抱く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since they say such troublesome things, I take them somewhere and embrace them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （エロシーンはテキストだけで、それっぽく）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The erotic scene is just text, but implied.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という事だ、わかったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s how it is, understood?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かるかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you understand?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざうざ言うなら、お前が同行して監視しておればよいだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you’re so annoying, you should accompany us and watch over things yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうさせてもらう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrived at a typical village in Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が攻めてきた後のようだ、廃墟になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like the demon army attacked here; it’s now ruins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き残った村人が数名います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are a few surviving villagers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な魔人が攻めてきたので、この村を踏み荒らしていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A gigantic demon lord attacked and trampled through this village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後まで勇敢に我々を守ってくれた警備隊の隊長さんも踏まれてぺしゃんこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the brave captain of the guards who protected us until the end was crushed beneath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※[５２１／ヘルマン被害１]が実行された後のシーンです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※This scene occurs after [521/Herman Damage 1] has been executed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン軍の陣地に着く、ラングバウへ向かう途中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive at the Herman army camp, on the way to Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスが現れる、第１軍の将軍になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos appears, now a general of the 1st Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに軽く挨拶をするが、話込んでいる暇は無く、次々と部下から入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He greets Rance briefly, but there’s no time for chatting as reports keep coming in from his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報を聞き指示を出している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He listens to the information and issues orders.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

no one knows how many underground floors it has—pretty amazing, right?"},{"lineNumber":252853,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は確か４２５階まで踏破したかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I think I managed to explore all the way down to the 425th floor."},{"lineNumber":252854,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、記録更新したくなったぞ。少し寄っていこうか","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I feel like breaking my record. Same vibe as Rance 8."},{"lineNumber":252857,"originalJapaneseLine":"４２６階に行きますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we go to the 426th floor?"},{"lineNumber":252858,"originalJapaneseLine":"行くぞ・・とー　エレベーターで下へ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s go... down by elevator."},{"lineNumber":252859,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":252860,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、４２７階の入り口を発見だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we’ve found the entrance to the 427th floor."},{"lineNumber":252861,"originalJapaneseLine":"影に隠れていた女の子が現れる、メリムだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A girl who was hiding in the shadows appears—Merim."},{"lineNumber":252862,"originalJapaneseLine":"メリムの強さではこんな所にはこれないはずだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"With Merim’s strength, she shouldn’t be able to come to a place like this, but..."},{"lineNumber":252863,"originalJapaneseLine":"１階をうろうろしていたら落とし穴（シューター）、またはトラップでここに落ちてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"She was wandering the first floor and fell here through a pitfall (shooter) or a trap."},{"lineNumber":252864,"originalJapaneseLine":"困っていた所ですが、ランスさんが来てくれてよかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"She was in trouble, but it’s good that Rance came along."},{"lineNumber":252865,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、メリムを連れて地上に戻ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, we’ll take Merim and return to the surface."},{"lineNumber":252866,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、４２７階の入り口だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, here’s the entrance to the 427th floor."},{"lineNumber":252867,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じだ。こうしてどんどん下まで進むのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that. This is how we keep pushing downwards."},{"lineNumber":252868,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう１階いってみようか。俺様の征服欲が先へ先へいざなうのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we go down one more floor? My desire for conquest leads me further and further."},{"lineNumber":252869,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルが今はそんな事をしている場合で無いとうまくたしなめる","translatedEnglishLine":"Siehl skillfully admonishes that now is no time for that."},{"lineNumber":252870,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたないな、戻るかと地上に戻ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Can’t be helped, let’s return — we head back to the surface."},{"lineNumber":252871,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrive at a typical village in Herman."},{"lineNumber":252872,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ魔軍が攻めてきてない所のようだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems the demon army hasn’t attacked here yet."},{"lineNumber":252873,"originalJapaneseLine":"警備隊が現れる、ルーベランだ。ランス９以来です。","translatedEnglishLine":"The guard appears—Rubelan. It’s been since Rance 9."},{"lineNumber":252874,"originalJapaneseLine":"革命の事は感謝しているが、法は法だ。手続きだ大事だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We appreciate the revolution, but the law is the law. Procedures matter."},{"lineNumber":252875,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは急ぐと言うのに、まて司令部に連絡して通行許可の確認を取るとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though Rance says we’re in a hurry, he insists on waiting to contact headquarters to get passage permission."},{"lineNumber":252876,"originalJapaneseLine":"手間取る事を言うので、どこかに連れ込んで抱く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Since they say such troublesome things, I take them somewhere and embrace them."},{"lineNumber":252877,"originalJapaneseLine":"（エロシーンはテキストだけで、それっぽく）","translatedEnglishLine":"(The erotic scene is just text, but implied.)"},{"lineNumber":252878,"originalJapaneseLine":"という事だ、わかったな","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s how it is, understood?"},{"lineNumber":252879,"originalJapaneseLine":"分かるかー","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you understand?"},{"lineNumber":252880,"originalJapaneseLine":"うざうざ言うなら、お前が同行して監視しておればよいだろうが","translatedEnglishLine":"If you’re so annoying, you should accompany us and watch over things yourself."},{"lineNumber":252881,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうさせてもらう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll do that."},{"lineNumber":252882,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrived at a typical village in Herman."},{"lineNumber":252883,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍が攻めてきた後のようだ、廃墟になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"It looks like the demon army attacked here; it’s now ruins."},{"lineNumber":252884,"originalJapaneseLine":"生き残った村人が数名います","translatedEnglishLine":"There are a few surviving villagers."},{"lineNumber":252885,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な魔人が攻めてきたので、この村を踏み荒らしていった","translatedEnglishLine":"A gigantic demon lord attacked and trampled through this village."},{"lineNumber":252886,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後まで勇敢に我々を守ってくれた警備隊の隊長さんも踏まれてぺしゃんこ","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the brave captain of the guards who protected us until the end was crushed beneath."},{"lineNumber":252887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※[５２１／ヘルマン被害１]が実行された後のシーンです","translatedEnglishLine":"※This scene occurs after [521/Herman Damage 1] has been executed."},{"lineNumber":252888,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン軍の陣地に着く、ラングバウへ向かう途中","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrive at the Herman army camp, on the way to Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252889,"originalJapaneseLine":"アミトスが現れる、第１軍の将軍になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Amitos appears, now a general of the 1st Army."},{"lineNumber":252890,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに軽く挨拶をするが、話込んでいる暇は無く、次々と部下から入る","translatedEnglishLine":"He greets Rance briefly, but there’s no time for chatting as reports keep coming in from his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":252891,"originalJapaneseLine":"情報を聞き指示を出している。","translatedEnglishLine":"He listens to the information and issues orders."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当初はキナニ砂漠方面からの進軍だけだったが、そちらに気を取られている隙に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first, the advance was only from the Kinani Desert area, but while they were distracted there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番裏の長城も半分は突破されている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Great Wall at the rear has also been breached halfway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総指揮はヒューバート、今も最前線に出ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The overall commander is Hubert, who is still at the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから上杉家を中心とした５万の部隊が送られてきている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A force of 50,000 troops centered around the Uesugi clan has been sent from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 非常に助かっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are a great help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方側の総兵力は３０万ほど（正確な数はもう把握出来ない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our total allied forces number about 300,000 (the exact count is no longer known).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍は魔物大将軍ルメイが率いる１００万からの軍勢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army, led by Great Demon General Lumei, numbers over one million.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに魔人バボラ、魔人ケイブリスがいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, there are the demon lords Babora and Kebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは会話というより、ナレーション的に説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is more of a narration-style explanation rather than a conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ラングバウについからも説明の機会があります、うまく別けて下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (There will also be an opportunity to explain about Langbau later; please separate them appropriately.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中のランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others on the march.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとヘルマンの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation between Siehl and Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンの奴に泣いて懇願されてヘルマン革命を手伝ってやったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Patton guy begged me tearfully, so I helped with the Herman revolution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ姫は当然ゲットした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, I got Princess Sheela.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、せっかく俺様が革命を成功させてやったのに、魔軍に攻められて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even though I made the revolution succeed, they’re getting attacked by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and things are falling apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行軍中のランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others on the march.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早くラングバウに行って魔人を退治してやらんとな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to hurry to Langbau and deal with the demon lords.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、この編にマルグリッド遺跡が確かあったよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, there was the Marugrid Ruins in this area, wasn’t there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは知らないだろうが、俺様はそこでも大冒険をしたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siehl probably doesn’t know, but I had a great adventure there too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最大の迷宮で地下何階あるか分からないのだ、すごいだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s the world’s largest labyrinth; no one knows how many underground floors it has—pretty amazing, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は確か４２５階まで踏破したかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think I managed to explore all the way down to the 425th floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、記録更新したくなったぞ。少し寄っていこうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I feel like breaking my record. Let’s drop by for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マルグリッド迷宮についた。ランス８と同じノリ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve arrived at the Marugrid Labyrinth. Same vibe as Rance 8.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４２６階に行きますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we go to the 426th floor?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行くぞ・・とー　エレベーターで下へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s go... down by elevator.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、４２７階の入り口を発見だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we’ve found the entrance to the 427th floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影に隠れていた女の子が現れる、メリムだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl who was hiding in the shadows appears—Merim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メリムの強さではこんな所にはこれないはずだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With Merim’s strength, she shouldn’t be able to come to a place like this, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １階をうろうろしていたら落とし穴（シューター）、またはトラップでここに落ちてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was wandering the first floor and fell here through a pitfall (shooter) or a trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困っていた所ですが、ランスさんが来てくれてよかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was in trouble, but it’s good that Rance came along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、メリムを連れて地上に戻ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, we’ll take Merim and return to the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、４２７階の入り口だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, here’s the entrance to the 427th floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じだ。こうしてどんどん下まで進むのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that. This is how we keep pushing downwards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう１階いってみようか。俺様の征服欲が先へ先へいざなうのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we go down one more floor? My desire for conquest leads me further and further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが今はそんな事をしている場合で無いとうまくたしなめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Siehl skillfully admonishes that now is no time for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたないな、戻るかと地上に戻ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can’t be helped, let’s return — we head back to the surface.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive at a typical village in Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ魔軍が攻めてきてない所のようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the demon army hasn’t attacked here yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警備隊が現れる、ルーベランだ。ランス９以来です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The guard appears—Rubelan. It’s been since Rance 9.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 革命の事は感謝しているが、法は法だ。手続きだ大事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We appreciate the revolution, but the law is the law. Procedures matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは急ぐと言うのに、まて司令部に連絡して通行許可の確認を取るとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though Rance says we’re in a hurry, he insists on waiting to contact headquarters to get passage permission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手間取る事を言うので、どこかに連れ込んで抱く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since they say such troublesome things, I take them somewhere and embrace them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （エロシーンはテキストだけで、それっぽく）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The erotic scene is just text, but implied.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という事だ、わかったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s how it is, understood?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かるかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you understand?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざうざ言うなら、お前が同行して監視しておればよいだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you’re so annoying, you should accompany us and watch over things yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうさせてもらう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの一般的な村に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrived at a typical village in Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が攻めてきた後のようだ、廃墟になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like the demon army attacked here; it’s now ruins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き残った村人が数名います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are a few surviving villagers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な魔人が攻めてきたので、この村を踏み荒らしていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A gigantic demon lord attacked and trampled through this village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後まで勇敢に我々を守ってくれた警備隊の隊長さんも踏まれてぺしゃんこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the brave captain of the guards who protected us until the end was crushed beneath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※[５２１／ヘルマン被害１]が実行された後のシーンです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※This scene occurs after [521/Herman Damage 1] has been executed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン軍の陣地に着く、ラングバウへ向かう途中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive at the Herman army camp, on the way to Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスが現れる、第１軍の将軍になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos appears, now a general of the 1st Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに軽く挨拶をするが、話込んでいる暇は無く、次々と部下から入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He greets Rance briefly, but there’s no time for chatting as reports keep coming in from his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報を聞き指示を出している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He listens to the information and issues orders.
